text: Andrew Johnson (born 10 February 1981) is an English former professional footballer who played as a striker. He played for Birmingham City, Crystal Palace, Everton, Fulham and Queens Park Rangers. ==Career statistics== ===Club=== Appearances and goals by club, season and competition Club Season League League
